modName: Kynareth's Benevolence - A Danica Pure-Spring Makeover
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://preview.ibb.co/f1EhDK/Kynarethsbenevolence.png[/img]﻿
[img]https://s8.postimg.cc/9uwnobubp/danica2.jpg[/img]﻿﻿

[img]https://s8.postimg.cc/sfo1sywh1/faqs.png[/img]﻿
[color=#c9daf8]
[/color][color=#6fa8dc][img]https://s8.postimg.cc/90d9zgq7p/Untitled_design_1.png[/img]﻿﻿
A: Select Danica, type 'setnpcweight 50' and then 'disable' and 'enable'.

[u][b]All without quote marks.[/b]
[/u]
[img]https://s8.postimg.cc/cwqlvht7p/Untitled_design.png[/img]﻿
A: Launch TES5EDIT with [b]Kynareth's Benevolence[/b].esp and your mod's esp activated. On the .esp containing the mod you wish to [b]NOT [/b]overhaul Danica, find the NPC section and delete Danica.


[b][u]Recommended mods!
[/u][/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/]UNP Minidresses[/url]﻿ (as this mod uses UNP body)
[/color][/center]
author: Raye
